nav.div: Promoting High Standards and Social Responsibility

div.div: Please go to the Current Update tab on the main page for updated news.

img.alt: Calhan Lions Club Educational Scholarship Featured Photo

div.div: The Calhan Lions Club will be awarding one $1,500 non-renewable scholarship to a graduating senior who has been accepted to an accredited University, College, Junior College or Vocational School. This scholarship should not be confused with the Calhan Lions Club Scholarship. The deadline for the CALHAN Lion’s Club Scholarship is noon on April 24, 2020. Detailed information and applications can be picked up at the scholarship wall in the main hall or with Ms. Taylor in counseling.

The Calhan Alumni Association will be awarding a $1,000 scholarship to one graduating senior planning to attend college or trade school and is a descendant of previous Calhan High School graduates. The deadline for this scholarship is May 4, 2020. Applications and detailed information can be picked up on the scholarship wall in the main hall or through Ms. Taylor in counseling.

Calhan Elementary School yearbooks for 2019/2020 are on sale for $20. Calhan Middle School/High School yearbooks for 2019/2020 are on sale for $45. Please contact Mrs. Kneis to reserve your copy at heather.kneis@calhanschool.org
